name: Dropzone

props.name: previewMinHeight
props.description: Minimum height for each preview tile while loading (px or CSS length).

props.name: showFileList
props.description: Show file icons and names rather than thumbnails

props.name: onFilesChange
props.description: Called whenever the file list changes

props.name: onDrop
props.description: Callback for when files are dropped

props.name: onDropRejected
props.description: Callback for when files are rejected (type/size/count)

props.name: preset
props.description: One or many style-preset names registered via `definePreset()`

bestPractices: Indicate accepted file types and size limits clearly before upload.
Provide both drag‑and‑drop and a clickable target for accessibility. Ensure the zone is keyboard operable.
Validate optimistically on drop and show per‑file status/errors with polite announcements.
Avoid blocking the UI; use background uploads and concise feedback.
Revoke object URLs for previews when files are removed or on unmount to avoid leaks.
Sanitize file names and never execute or render untrusted content.
